In a statement, the South American cultural figure said: “For more than forty years, I have been working with Denis to develop a visual vocabulary, a ways of thinking that can be understood and practiced without the aid of words. . . .This is a monumental task; one that has required a lifetime commitment and a great artistic imagination.
